titles.title: Establishing Mandatory Minimums for Illegal Reentry Act of 2015
A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to increase the penalties applicable to aliens who unlawfully reenter the United States after being removed.
Establishing Mandatory Minimums for Illegal Reentry Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Establishing Mandatory Minimums for Illegal Reentry Act of 2015
This bill amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to increase penalties applicable to aliens who unlawfully reenter the United States after being removed.
